main event: Three round objects with tails observed descending in Westport, Mississippi on 29 October 1953.
interesting points: The objects were described as having a red tail with yellow and white colors,They were observed for approximately 15 minutes,The witness and two friends noted the objects moving low in the sky,There were reports and analysis indicating it could be an astronomical phenomenon or meteor,The witness believed the objects were not a comet or falling star due to their slow movement.
witness description: The report includes a witness along with two other friends.
